mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, global_user_id, mobile, is_useable, remark, create_time, dml_time
mapper.update: UPDATE hqls_user SET user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, global_user_id = #{globalUserId}, mobile = #{mobile}, is_useable = #{isUseable}, remark = #{remark}, create_time = #{createTime}, dml_time = #{dmlTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select:
select hu.* from hqls_user hu
left join hqls_user_role hur on hu.user_id = hur.user_id
where 1=1
and hur.role_id = #{roleId}
and hu.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and hu.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
